author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mycronic ‍Q4 EBIT At SEK 312 Mln
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - MYCRONIC AB (PUBL):
* Q4 ‍ORDER INTAKE WAS SEK 572 (518) MILLION​ * ‍Q4 NET SALES AMOUNTED TO SEK 931 (1,016) MILLION​ * ‍Q4 EBIT AMOUNTED TO SEK 312 (405) MILLION​ * ‍PROPOSES TO AGM A DIVIDEND OF SEK 2.50 (2.00) PER SHARE, IN ACCORDANCE WITH DIVIDEND POLICY.​
* ‍EARNINGS FOR AS WERE CHARGED WITH ACQUISITION-RELATED COSTS OF SEK 107 MILLION.​
* ‍“WE ARE SYSTEMATICALLY EVALUATING POSSIBLE ACQUISITIONS.”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
